tool_description: Convert numbers to their Arabic text representation

api_list.name: convert
api_list.description: Convert the number into its Arabic text representation. This API allows users to input a number and receive its equivalent in Arabic text.

required_parameters.name: the_number
required_parameters.description: Put the number here. Decimal is supported by most units.

optional_parameters.name: hundreds_form
optional_parameters.description: Some use مائة others use مئة, both work in Arabic. If left empty, the default is مائة.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The counted subject, be it a currency like درهم إماراتي or a size unit like متر مربع. If the unit does not appear in the text result, it may not be supported. Please contact us to add it.
